00019 #include "DataSetHeaderWriter.h"
00020 #include "FileOutput.h"
00021 
00022 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00023 
00024 void DataSetHeaderWriter::Write(std::ofstream &os, DataSetHeader &dc)
00025 {
00026         WriteDataOffset(os, 0);
00027         WriteNextDataSetOffset(os, 0);
00028         WriteName(os, dc);
00029         WriteNameValCnt(os, dc);
00030         WriteNameValParams(os, dc);
00031         WriteColumnCnt(os, dc);
00032         WriteColumnTypes(os, dc);
00033         WriteRowCnt(os, dc);
00034 }
00035 
00036 void DataSetHeaderWriter::WriteDataOffset(std::ofstream &os, u_int32_t pos)
00037 {
00038         dataPos = os.tellp();
00039         FileOutput::WriteInt32(os, pos);
00040 }
00041 
00042 void DataSetHeaderWriter::UpdateDataOffset(std::ofstream &os, u_int32_t pos) const
00043 {
00044         if(dataPos > 0) 
00045         {
00046                 os.seekp(dataPos, std::ios::beg);
00047                 FileOutput::WriteUInt32(os, pos);
00048                 os.seekp(pos, std::ios::beg);
00049         }
00050 }
00051 
00052 void DataSetHeaderWriter::WriteNextDataSetOffset(std::ofstream &os, u_int32_t pos)
00053 {
00054         nextDataSetPos = os.tellp();
00055         FileOutput::WriteInt32(os, pos);
00056 }
00057 
00058 void DataSetHeaderWriter::UpdateNextDataSetOffset(std::ofstream &os, u_int32_t pos) const
00059 {
00060         if(nextDataSetPos > 0) 
00061         {
00062                 os.seekp(nextDataSetPos, std::ios::beg);
00063                 FileOutput::WriteUInt32(os, pos);
00064                 os.seekp(pos, std::ios::beg);
00065         }
00066 }
00067 
00068 void DataSetHeaderWriter::WriteName(std::ofstream &os, const DataSetHeader &dc) const
00069 {
00070         FileOutput::WriteString16(os, dc.GetName());
00071 }
00072 
00073 void DataSetHeaderWriter::WriteNameValCnt(std::ofstream &os, const DataSetHeader &dc) const
00074 {
00075         FileOutput::WriteInt32(os, dc.GetNameValParamCnt());
00076 }
00077 
00078 void DataSetHeaderWriter::WriteNameValParams(std::ofstream &os, DataSetHeader &dc)
00079 {
00080         ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt begin;
00081         ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt end;
00082         dc.GetNameValIterators(begin, end);
00083         while(begin != end)
00084         {
00085                 FileOutput::WriteString16(os, begin->GetName());
00086                 MIMEValue mv = begin->GetMIMEValue();
00087                 u_int32_t sz;
00088                 const void* ptr = mv.GetValue(sz);
00089                 FileOutput::WriteBlob(os, ptr, sz);
00090                 FileOutput::WriteString16(os, begin->GetMIMEType());
00091                 begin++;
00092         }
00093 }
00094 
00095 void DataSetHeaderWriter::WriteColumnCnt(std::ofstream &os, const DataSetHeader &dc) const
00096 {
00097         FileOutput::WriteInt32(os, dc.GetColumnCnt());
00098 }
00099 
00100 void DataSetHeaderWriter::WriteColumnTypes(std::ofstream &os, const DataSetHeader &dc) const
00101 {
00102         int32_t sz = dc.GetColumnCnt();
00103         
00104         // Write the types
00105         for(int i = 0; i < sz; i++)
00106         {
00107                 ColumnInfo col = dc.GetColumnInfo(i);
00108                 FileOutput::WriteString16(os, col.GetName());
00109                 FileOutput::WriteInt8(os, col.GetColumnType());
00110                 FileOutput::WriteInt32(os, col.GetSize());
00111         }
00112 }
00113 
00114 void DataSetHeaderWriter::WriteRowCnt(std::ofstream &os, const DataSetHeader &dc) const
00115 {
00116         FileOutput::WriteInt32(os, dc.GetRowCnt());
00117 }
